Skrillex Drops Massive New Track 'Midnight Hour'

Posted by Brittany Prevost on August 29, 2019

From time and time again, Skrillex has continuously proven why he is a force to be reckoned with in the global musical specter! Whether the 31-year-old is busy producing some of the most sought after tracks of this era or collaborating with some of the biggest artists in the music industry, fans are always left astounded by his undeniable skills!

During this year's Miami Music Week, the legend himself, unsurprisingly, lived up to his household name. Accompanied by his equally talented friends, Boys Noize, and Ty Dolla $ign, the group dropped a killer ID, resulting in a frenzy amongst their fans.

Check out the Debut Below:

Today, their army of followers' prayers have been answered; the highly anticipated ID has officially been released! Christened 'Midnight Hour', the track was well worth the wait and is now available via OWSLA/Atlantic Records.

Check It Out Below:

The soon-to-be chart-topping track features Ty Dolla $ign's smooth vocals and is expertly accompanied by one of Dog Blood member's festival-ready beats. The tune is guaranteed to be a go-to anthem for any dance music setting and will have you dancing before the end of the track! 

A little over a month ago, Skrillex surprised his fans by releasing a brand-new EP called 'Show Tracks'. The two-track EP consists of 'Fuji Opener' in collaboration with Alvin Risk and 'Mumbai Power' which features Beam. This welcomed EP is but another example of the wave of new music promised by the beloved DJ.

Now that the tone has been set, there is nothing stopping the American producer from continuing to claim his rightful place as God of Dubstep, and perhaps even more, in the ever-growing music world. We absolutely can't wait to hear what else he has in store! 

Written By Brittany Prevost
